nycTheatreExcerpt: : "Seemingly a standard 90-minute issue play addressing the topic of vaccine skepticism, Jonathan Spector's Eureka Day, now on Broadway at the Samuel J. Friedman Theatre under the banner of Manhattan Theatre Club, is actually a blunt yet effective portrait of power in allegedly egalitarian spaces."

keyPhrases.quote: Eureka Day is actually a blunt yet effective portrait of power in allegedly egalitarian spaces.
